If it was a blank page, it didn't work for you. It is a bunch of
javascript running in the window. You should see a chat window
within
about 1 minute.


I see, I think that's a problem. Thanks.

messages.subject: Re: IRC channel
messages.msgSnippet: ... looked ... logged ... chat on ... on IRC, ... room on ... use it. ... If it was a blank page, it didn t work for you. It is a bunch of javascript running
messages.messageBody:
--- In samuraihistory@yahoogroups.com, "Totok Sudarijanto"
<totoks@...> wrote:
>
> I tried to log in once yesterday but I didn't know how to use it, it
looked
> like nothing happen, just a blank page. Mybe the reason nobody every
logged
> in is because nobody knows that we have a chat room. Normaly people
chat on
> IRC, well, at least that what I know. Maybe if we create one channel
on IRC,
> that would be great (just a thought). Anyway, I logged in the chat
room on
> samurai history yahoogroups page yesterday but I didn't know how to
use it.
> It appeared to me only a blank page.
>

If it was a blank page, it didn't work for you. It is a bunch of
javascript running in the window. You should see a chat window within
about 1 minute.

messages.subject: RE: [samuraihistory] Re: IRC channel
messages.msgSnippet: I tried to log in once yesterday but I didn t know how to use it, it looked like nothing happen, just a blank page. Mybe the reason nobody every logged in is
messages.messageBody:
I tried to log in once yesterday but I didn't know how to use it, it looked
like nothing happen, just a blank page. Mybe the reason nobody every logged
in is because nobody knows that we have a chat room. Normaly people chat on
IRC, well, at least that what I know. Maybe if we create one channel on IRC,
that would be great (just a thought). Anyway, I logged in the chat room on
samurai history yahoogroups page yesterday but I didn't know how to use it.
It appeared to me only a blank page.


From: samuraihistory@yahoogroups.com
[mailto:samuraihistory@yahoogroups.com] On Behalf Of Kitsuno
Sent: Sunday, February 19, 2006 1:44 AM
To: samuraihistory@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [samuraihistory] Re: IRC channel


--- In samuraihistory@yahoogroups.com, Nate Ledbetter
<ltdomer98@...>
wrote:
>
>
>
> --- Kitsuno <samurai-listowner@...>
> wrote:
>
> >
> >
> > This is the Samurai History Chat Room:
> >
> > http://groups.yahoo.com/group/samuraihistory/chat
>
> We have a chat room? Has anyone ever used it? My goodness...
>
>

I don't think it has ever been used. I stayed logged in to the chat
room all night last night, but it doesn't look like anyone else ever
logged in. I don't think I have ever used it before either.
